uh guys.... its out: To upgrade from Ubuntu 9.04 on a desktop system, press Alt+F2 and type in "update-manager -d" (without the quotes) into the command box. Update Manager should open up and tell you: New distribution release '9.10' is available. Click Upgrade and follow the on-screen instructions
the -d in that command explicitly means that it's not out yet.  -d is required to upgrade to development versions
